column4: 90% of computer usage is now web based. Give them a good browser and let them know it is safer from viruses, easy to transition.
amen
you will still need to install the DVD codec, then ANY player will be able to play DVDs
sure but its very insecure and uses 2 ports (wasteful)
its great to ssh from work to home, then launch irssi and chat
That is what I am doing now.
i'll be doing the sameon my 12 hour shift tonight too :)
its also fun to run web browsers over X and play the sound through the serving sound device (also funny at 4am blaring out some Meshuggah to bother the neighbours ;))
I use mpg123 to play songs to my wife when she is on the computer.
or you can use espeak and tell her nice things to get brownie points

cat "ShakespeareSonnets.txt" |espeak
